traits.Burning Fury: When the salamander takes fire damage, its Freezing Breath automatically recharges.

actions.Multiattack: The salamander makes five attacks: four with its claws and one with its bite.
actions.Claws: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.
actions.Bite: Melee Weapon Attack: +9+1d8 + 5 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage and 5 (1d10) cold damage.
actions.Freezing Breath (Recharge 6): The salamander exhales chill wind in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17+1d8 + 13 Constitution saving throw, taking 44 (8d10) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
